title: HeartSync
description: HeartSync is an innovative project designed to externalize emotions using a heartbeat monitoring device. Inspired by an old clock, this device integrates a MAX30102 sensor for accurate heart rate monitoring, an ESP32 microcontroller for data processing, and a servo motor to display heart rate information on the clock face. By visualizing the heartbeat, HeartSync enhances self-understanding and interpersonal connections. This project merges creative design with physical computing to create a unique emotional interface.

title: NASA SUITS DESIGN CHALLENGE
description: This project focused on developing an all-in-one AR interface for NASA astronauts. Our innovative design, created in collaboration with UC Berkeley and Baylor University, ensures critical information is non-intrusive and always visible. Using voice commands powered by a language model (LLM), astronauts can operate hands-free. Additionally, the interface includes a rover tracking feature to control Leo rovers. By integrating robot digital twin datasets, our team significantly contributed to space exploration technology. Fun fact: We often shouted 'Hello Bear!' during tests.

title: AR Activation
description: AR Activation Project at ShiftPixy: I transformed everyday workspaces into immersive AR environments using Spark AR Studio. These captivating experiences brought company mascots and characters to life. Through target tracking, the characters would spring into action, interacting with users whenever specific images were detected by the camera.

title: XR Ophthalmoscopy Simulator
description: The XR Ophthalmoscopy Simulator is part of a research collaboration with the IDSC and Bascom Palmer Eye Institute. This VR tool is designed to help medical students practice eye examinations, offering an immersive, risk-free learning environment with realistic 3D eye models and varied scenarios to enhance diagnostic skills.

title: Design and Fabrication
description: Outside of my digital design work, I also enjoy fabrication projects.

title: ShiftPixy Animation + Game
description: Developed during my time at ShiftPixy Labs, “Clukin Lucky” is an endless runner game crafted for a collaborative brand partnership. Positioned as a captivating blend of adrenaline-pumping gameplay and brand promotion, this game invites players to embark on ceaseless chases, overcoming obstacles and collecting in-game items.

title: SunWater Plus
description: SunWater Plus is a sustainable water filtration system designed to harness solar energy for water purification. By integrating solar panels and advanced filtration technology, it provides clean drinking water efficiently and eco-consciously. The system includes an AR feature for easy panel installation and filter replacement, ensuring optimal performance and user convenience. SunWater Plus aims to address water scarcity and promote sustainable living by leveraging renewable energy sources and innovative design.

title: Medidish (AI Chatbot)
description: MediDish is an AI-driven Chinese Medicinal Diet Guide designed to revolutionize wellness. This project aims to bridge the gap between Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) and modern dietary needs by providing users with personalized medicinal recipes. Leveraging a large language model (LLM), MediDish offers a database of Chinese medicinal cuisine, dietary herbal medicine, and nutrition therapy. The user interface, inspired by traditional Chinese medicine cabinets, organizes and presents this information in a user-friendly manner, promoting the practical application of TCM in daily life.

title: Mix reality - Boba Making Experience
description: In November 2023, I dove into an exciting hackathon at Stanford! Our team took on the challenge of creating a mixed reality experience centered around everyone's favorite treat—boba tea. Using Unity 2022.3.12f1 and the Quest 3, we brought the joy of boba-making to life. Users can create their digital twin of the cup, and their recipe would automatically adjust based on the cup's volume. Let's have fun and one virtual tapioca pearl at a time!

title: Puzzle Now
description: This project was an extension of a hackathon, where I worked in a team of three to create a fun puzzle game for the Apple Vision Pro upon its release. 'Puzzle Now' offers an immersive puzzle experience, allowing users to interact with puzzle pieces in a spatial environment. With varying difficulty levels and automatic clustering of pieces, the game provides both challenge and entertainment, enhanced by interactive sound and feedback. Now available on the Apple Store.

title: Unreal Niagara system - liquid simulation
description: This is a project aims to explore the complex interactions between water and wind, focusing on how these dynamics influence and collide with objects (a sea monster and a boat) in a sea environment. I also designed the models, handled shading, and mapped the textures.
